DOC.brief_summary: Plasma specimen collected from patients presenting in the Emergency Department (ED) with or without Heart Failure (HF) and prescribed a BNP.
DOC.brief_title: Blood Collection of Patient Presenting in the ED and Prescribed a BNP
DOC.detailed_description: Plasma samples are collected from a minimum of 400 subjects. Specimens are used to confirm the currently accepted BNP cut off as and aid in the diagnosis and assessment of HF. Stored specimens for future use in BNP assay development.
DOC.criteria: Males and females >21 years of age Able to understand and willing to provide informed consent Present in to ED BNP test requested Males and females< 21 years Unable to provide informed consent Not presenting to ED hemolyzed sample
